current_todos.task: Review all agent prompts for consistency
current_todos.notes: Verify all have SYSTEM CONTEXT header
Tester is verifying DONE tasks well. Recent logs show thorough testing of TASK-090 and TASK-086. No explicit regression testing visible in logs - but prompt requires it. Continue monitoring.

completed_todos.notes: Baseline established: Cron active, disk 5%, memory 1.9Gi/7.6Gi, web app responding 200, all JSON files valid.

completed_todos.task: Check task flow health (TODO → DONE → VERIFIED)
completed_todos.notes: Found 48 TODO tasks, 0 IN_PROGRESS/DONE/FAILED. Tasks may be getting archived quickly after VERIFIED status. Created follow-up todo to investigate.

completed_todos.task: Validate all JSON files in /api/ directory
completed_todos.notes: All JSON files valid. No broken files found.

completed_todos.task: Investigate why task flow shows 48 TODO but no IN_PROGRESS/DONE
completed_todos.notes: Resolved: Previous grep pattern was wrong (searching for 'Status:' instead of '**Status**:'). Actual counts: 47 TODO, 8 VERIFIED. Task flow is healthy - IN_PROGRESS/DONE states are transient.

completed_todos.task: Fix Python boolean error in cron-orchestrator.sh
completed_todos.notes: Fixed: update_orchestrator_status() was passing bash 'true'/'false' directly to Python heredoc, causing 'name true/false is not defined' errors. Added conversion to Python 'True'/'False' booleans.

observations.note: Supervisor agent initialized. Ecosystem documentation updated with autonomous system context across all files.
INCIDENT: security-metrics.json was broken (malformed JSON). User discovered it, not tester. Tester prompt updated with mandatory JSON validation.

First supervisor run: System healthy. Cron active, disk 5%, memory 25%, web app 200 OK. Found and fixed 'Invalid agent name: developer2' error in update-agent-status.sh - script was missing developer2 and supervisor agents.

Second supervisor run: System healthy. Cron active, disk 5%, memory 12% (903Mi/7.6Gi), web app 200 OK, all JSON files valid. Fixed Python boolean error in cron-orchestrator.sh that was causing errors on every run. Task flow healthy with 47 TODO tasks and 8 VERIFIED.

concerns.concern: Tester agent is not doing regression testing. Failed to catch broken security.html page. Tester prompt has been updated - monitor if behavior improves.
update-agent-status.sh was missing developer2 and supervisor from valid agents list. Fixed this run. Error was appearing in cron.log but not blocking execution.
